archimate:Requirement.name: The Security Monitoring service require not only technology but also operational processes and a governance model
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Modern security is not only about monitoring. It is about prevention, about detection and mainly about correct response to detections supported by working operational processes and a governance structure. The Security Monitoring service require not only technology but also operational processes and a governance model ensuring that correct responses to detections are made quickly and handled correctly without unnecessary delays.
